@graph.name: Penne and Broccoli in Doritos cream sauce, topped with Doritos spiced bread crumbs. Home-made Doritos Spice Blend Recipe. Vegan - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: A quick Weeknight pasta - Penne and Broccoli in Doritos cream sauce. No store bought Doritos in this recipe. A vegan recipe

itemListElement.name: Penne and Broccoli in Doritos cream sauce, topped with Doritos spiced bread crumbs. Home-made Doritos Spice Blend Recipe. Vegan

@graph.name: Penne and Broccoli in Doritos cream sauce, topped with Doritos spiced bread crumbs.
@graph.description: No store bought Doritos were used in this recipe. Just some spices and flavors together and voila!
recipeIngredient: 1.5-2 cups cooked Whole grain Penne or any pasto of choice
1/3 cup  raw cashews (soaked in water for atleast half an hour)
1 teaspoon lemon juice or apple cider vinegar
2 teaspoons dried onion flakes or 1 teaspoon onion powder
a generous pinch Rock salt/Kala namak
You can add Daiya cheddar or yellow mustard powder for cheddar
Toasted Bread Crumbs or Toasted Oats and rice flakes (coarsely ground.(1.5-2 Tablespoons))

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the doritos spice mix or blend in grinder to get a well blended mix. Taste test and adjust.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the doritos spice mix or blend in grinder to get a well blended mix. Taste test and adjust.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Penne per instructions. Blanch the broccoli(cook 3-4 minutes in boiling water, then rinse in cold water).
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the Penne per instructions. Blanch the broccoli(cook 3-4 minutes in boiling water, then rinse in cold water).

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the soaked cashews with enough water to make a smooth cream.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the soaked cashews with enough water to make a smooth cream.

recipeInstructions.text: Add lemon juice, salt to taste and half of the Doritos spice mix to the cashew cream.
recipeInstructions.name: Add lemon juice, salt to taste and half of the Doritos spice mix to the cashew cream.

recipeInstructions.text: You can just toss the pasta and broccoli and serve at this point. I usually like to heat everything a bit so the spice taste comes out more and cashew cream doesnt taste raw.
recipeInstructions.name: You can just toss the pasta and broccoli and serve at this point. I usually like to heat everything a bit so the spice taste comes out more and cashew cream doesnt taste raw.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add 2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil, heat on medium.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add 2 teaspoons extra virgin olive oil, heat on medium.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the broccoli and toss for a few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the broccoli and toss for a few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the pasta and the cashew cream. Mix well. Cover and let it start to bubble on low heat. (1-2 minutes).
recipeInstructions.name: Add the pasta and the cashew cream. Mix well. Cover and let it start to bubble on low heat. (1-2 minutes).

recipeInstructions.text: Taste test and adjust spices and salt and take off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste test and adjust spices and salt and take off heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix some of the Doritos spice with bread crumbs or crumbs of toasted Oats and rice flakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix some of the Doritos spice with bread crumbs or crumbs of toasted Oats and rice flakes.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the crumbs on hot pasta right before serving!
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the crumbs on hot pasta right before serving!
